title: Headout | Software Enginner | Remote | ~2 YOE
content:
Education: B.Tech. (IIIT Allahabad)
Prev Experience: Zomato (1 Yr 8 Months)
Last Compensation: 23 Fixed + 10 ESOPs = 33 LPA

Offer Date: Feb 2024
Company: Headout
Title: Software Engineer
Location: Remote
Base: ₹27 Lac
Performance Bonus: ₹3 Lac
ESOPs: ₹18 Lac grant vested over 4 years (25%, 25%, 25%, 25%)
First Year ESOPs: ₹4,25,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ₹ 34,25,000
Benefits:
* Leaves
	* Unlimited sick leaves
	* Unlimited mental wellness leaves
	* No ceiling general leave
* Health & Wellness:
	* Health insurance cover for INR 7 Lacs for yourself, your spouse, your children and your parents (up to 6 in total)
	* 50% off fitness class memberships
	* Medical tele-consultation with doctors
* General Perks:
	* $500 headout credis for headout experiences around the world
	* Unlimited learning credits for paid courses and sessions
	* Community lunches twice a week across all offices
* Flexi Work:
	* Hybrid / Remote work based on team
	* One time WFH setup allowance of $250

title: Google | L3 | Bangalore | ~2 YOE
content:
Education: B.Tech. (IIIT Allahabad)
Prev Experience:
* 	Zomato (1 Yr 8 Months)
* 	Headout (3 Months)

Last Compensation: 27 Fixed + 3 Perf. Bonus + 4.25 ESOPs = 34.25 LPA

Offer Date: May 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: (SWE-II) L3
Location: Bangalore
Base: ₹21,90,000
Performance Bonus: ₹3,28,500 (15% of Base)
Stock: $55k stock grant vested over 4 years (38%, 32%, 20%, 10%)
First Year Stock: ₹17,34,700
Signing Bonus: ₹3,00,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ₹ 45,53,200
Benefits: Standard Google benefits

title: Oracle Cerner | Software Developer 3 (MTS) | Bangalore
content:
Education: Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 2 years 9 months
Prior Experience: Indian Service-Based
Date of the Offer: April 2024
Company: Oracle Cerner (OHAI)
Title/Level: Software Developer 3 - Member of Technical Staff
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 26LPA (Total Fixed)
Stock Bonus: 4L/yr for 4yr
Total comp: 30LPA

Accepted the offer.

Other offers:

title: Boku | SDE-2 | Mumbai
content:
Education: Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 2 years 9 months
Prior Experience: Indian Service-Based
Date of the Offer: April 2024
Company: Boku Inc
Title/Level: SDE - 2
Location: Mumbai
Salary: 27LPA (Total Fixed)
Stock: 2LPA
Total Annual Comp: 29LPA
Benefits: Setup Cost upto 24K + Food

Rejected the verbal offer as I had a similar compensation in Bangalore and relocating and staying in Mumbai would have been costlier.
Other offers:
OpenText: https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5104967/OpenText-or-SWE-or-Bangalore
Oracle Cerner: https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5105038/Oracle-Cerner-or-Software-Developer-3-(MTS)-or-Bangalore

title: Deloitte USI | Consultant - Data Scientist | Kolkata
content:
* **Education:** B.Tech Computer science (Tier I) - Non IIT/NIT
* **Years of: Experience**: 2.9 
* **Prior Experience:** Product based MNC, Big4
* **Date of the Offer**: April 2024
* **Company:** Deloitte USI 
* **Title/Level**: Consultant Data Scientist 
* **Location**: Kolkata 
* **Salary**: 2300000
* **Relocation**: 50000
* **Signing Bonus**: 100000
* **Stock bonus**: NIL
* **Bonus**: Performance-based bonus up to 10% of salary every year ~ 230000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): ~26,80,000
Benefits: Health insurance, Fuel Allowance, Mobile Phone Allowance every 2 year
* **Other details**: Accepted the Offer

* **Current Compensation** - 13,64,000(Fixed) + 1,34,000 (Bonus)
